name: Arjun Reddy
follow_up_instructions: Weigh yourself daily and report sudden weight gain (>2 lbs in 24 hours)
Limit sodium intake to 2000mg per day
Schedule lab work for kidney function tests in 2 weeks
Attend dialysis sessions as scheduled (3 times per week)
discharge_summary:
Patient Arjun Reddy was admitted on 2025-08-27 with Hypertensive Nephrosclerosis. 
During hospitalization, patient was managed with Metformin 500mg twice daily, Sodium bicarbonate 650mg three times daily, Metoprolol 50mg twice daily. 
Procedures performed included Arteriovenous fistula creation, Central line placement, Kidney stone removal (ureteroscopy).
Patient's condition improved and was stable at discharge. 
Discharged home with instructions to follow up with nephrologist and continue medications as prescribed. 
Patient educated on warning signs and dietary restrictions.
